title: How to Overcome Social Anxiety | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Prepdish, go to prepdish.com/impact to get two weeks completely free. Sanebox. Visit sanebox.com/IMPACT to sign up for your 14-day free trial and receive a $25 credit. SaneBox brings sanity back to your inbox by prioritizing what's important, removing spam/junk, grouping newsletters together, and automating tedious tasks. ButcherBox. Use the discount code: "IMPACT" at butcherbox.com to get 20$ off and FREE BACON Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   QUESTION TOPICS   Tom explains how you can overcome social anxiety [4:10]  How you can learn to control your temper [9:04] How you can find the concrete steps to cultivate your goal [12:27] Tom goes through his top pump up songs to generate more energy [20:50] Tom explains his journey and process through his most recent 5-day fast [22:08] Should you keep your day job or follow the entrepreneurship path...both? [24:49]  How you can develop better relationships with your loved ones who you feel hold you back [27:42] Ways you can stick to a 'routine' while constantly on the road [31:01] Feeling stuck in your job? This is how you level up [33:47] If you want your question answered by Tom in an AMA, Please submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”
